name: "Soul Searching"
description:
Game Jam game made in ~two days in August at the Guildford Game Jam hosted by Media Molecule!

It's a jam game so it has bugs - you'll probably clip through a wall at some point, sorry!

Controls: 

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

E - Interact

Mouse - Interact, Draw Platforms

Creators:

Bogdan Vera - https://twitter.com/BogdanVera

Emei Burell - https://twitter.com/emeiburell

Pablo López Soriano - https://twitter.com/kednar
